summary: An email chain from July 29, 2020, in which an FBI Special Agent offers assistance to Squad C-20 regarding the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The initial email requests assistance for this high-profile case.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI
persons.context: Responds to a request for assistance from Squad C-20 regarding the Epstein/Maxwell investigation, stating availability to help.

events.title: FBI Assistance Request for Epstein/Maxwell Investigation
events.description: Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) sends an email requesting assistance for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, describing it as a unique, high-profile opportunity.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20, focused on Violent Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking (VCAC/HT), was actively seeking assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 2020.
An FBI Special Agent based in NYC responded affirmatively to the request for assistance.
The investigation was described internally as a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity'.
The email chain indicates ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein and Maxwell well after Epstein's 2019 arrest and death.
